summary: A former gangster is forced to resume his old lifestyle when his violent, jealous ex-colleagues and the police believe that he knows the location of a stolen cache of $300,000.
cast: Gastone Moschin|Barbara Bouchet|Mario Adorf|Frank Wolff|Luigi Pistilli|Ivo Garrani|Philippe Leroy|Lionel Stander|Mario Novelli|Giuseppe Castellano|Salvatore Arico|Fernando Cerulli|Giulio Baraghini|Ernesto Colli|Empedocle Buzzanca|Ettore Geri|Fortunato Cecilia|Sergio Serafini|Giorgio Trestini|Imelde Marani|Rossella Bergamonti|Mira Vidotto|Franco Beltramme|Alberto Fogliani|Toni Trono|Bruno Bertocci|Luciano Cecchini|Alessandro Tedeschi|Artemio Antonini|Salvatore Billa|Angelo Boscariol|Marina Brengola|Sisto Brunetti|Dolores Calò|Omero Capanna|Rolando De Santis|Fernando Di Leo|Cesare Di Vito|Lina Franchi|Gilberto Galimberti|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Giuseppe Leone|Domenico Maggio|Marco Mariani|Antonio Mea|Gianni Milito|Claudio Morabito|Nello Palladino|Mario Pavone|Gastone Pescucci|Pupita Lea Scuderoni|Edda Tiberio|Mauro Vestri
title: Milán, calibre 9
